description: Play after a successful mission to celebrate.  Place this into your score pile, it counts as +5 score.
Play if you had a successful mission and an opponent had a failed mission.  The opponent must place this card in his/her deck for -7 points.
Play with a rocket, it will increase the engine by +2.
You automatically win a race to the same mission/destination.  If another coffee is played by someone else, then go off of the engine between you.
You may choose one player when rocket/spacecraft cards are placed face down.  They must show you the cards.  You do not have to play your own cards.
Draw 1 destination and mission card, play at the start of your turn.  This is revealed, as normal, but only you can attempt to go there.  Discard when done.
Play when you fail a manned mission, your crew is not lost, you do not draw any outrage cards for the crew, still draw 1 for the rocket.
Discard this card at anytime to draw two cards.
Play this card in front of a target player.  The player must draw a public outrage card at the very end of their turn.  Discard this card when resolved.
At the beginning of each turn, add one card from the deck to this card.  Once it has 3 cards, put those 3 cards into your hand, and discard this card.
